name: Cybernetic Eye, Wide Spectrum Visual (TL-17)
description:
The wide spectrum visual eye combines magnification and image enhancement with sensitivity to light across a broad spectrum, from ultraviolet through infrared (USPBGRCAN visual bands). This cybernetic eye has a range of 400 meters. This version of the cybernetic eye is single-function eye and looks more like a natural, unaltered eye.

In all cases, the cyber eye also includes basic visible light vision. For Sophonts with different visual ranges the basic cyber eye will cover their normal visual range.
